body:
add properties to player.profile for AI players to selectively enable/disable use of target hint and target picker

eg.
useTargetHint=true/false
useTargetPicker=true/false
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: Enable per AI configuration of target hint and target picker
content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on September 25, 2014 10:37:38_

add properties to player.profile for AI players to selectively enable/disable use of target hint and target picker

eg.
useTargetHint=true/false
useTargetPicker=true/false

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=698_
